qas.question: Which Queen song was featured in the autumn of 2009 on Glee
What Queen song did the Glee choir perform in June 2010?
What Queen song was performed on a May 2012 episode of Glee?
What Queen song is featured on Glee's The Graduation Album?

context: In the autumn of 2009, Glee featured the fictional high school's show choir singing "<a0_0>Somebody to Love<a0_0/>" as their second act performance in the episode "The Rhodes Not Taken". The performance was included on the show's Volume 1 soundtrack CD. In June 2010, the choir performed "<a1_0>Another One Bites the Dust<a1_0/>" in the episode "Funk". The following week's episode, "Journey to Regionals", features a rival choir performing "Bohemian Rhapsody" in its entirety. The song was featured on the episode's EP. In May 2012, the choir performed "<a2_0><a3_0>We Are the Champions<a3_0/><a2_0/>" in the episode "Nationals", and the song features in The Graduation Album.
